Class Stable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Stable

  • public class Stable
extends java.lang.Object
    The Stable class is a monitor that contains all the necessary methods to be used in mutual exclusive access by the Broker and Horses to itself.

    This is where the Horses are initially and after a race.

    Since:
    2018-03-21
